dedication.para: Builders notes are dedicated to the entire N8VEM project community.

chapter.para: The S100 6502 v02 CPU board is a IEEE-696 compatible master/slave CPU board with onboard boot (e)eprom.

The Theory of Operation cannot hope to fully explain the entire board, but at least some helpful notes will be provided. Generally this should aim to exceed a simple list of features, without going into design detail. A good analogy is there is a physical walkthru at the start of the construction section, this section is more of a conceptual or theoretical walkthru.

warning.para: No one in any way connected to the project or the builders notes formally endorses any of the suppliers listed below! Caveat Emptor!

listitem.para: The silkscreen for U33 and U29 overlap their components to the right. U33 has two adjacent resistors, and U29 has a 3 pin header.

chapter.para: Notes regarding configuration of the board. DIP switches, jumpers.
You'll need some 2-pin shorting plugs for configuration jumpers, at least 15 or so. Jameco 112432 $0.12 on 2013-01-27 per VLM.
The testing chapter attempts to fully exercise a (recently) completed board to prove operation of all components. Troubleshooting advice will be provided.
